label: outline_phase_03_scene_draft_attempt2
text:
{
  "schema_version": "1.1",
  "characters": [
    {
      "character_id": "CHAR_ARTIE",
      "name": "Arthur 'Artie' Penhaligon",
      "pronouns": "he/him",
      "role": "protagonist",
      "intro": {
        "chapter": 1,
        "scene": 1
      }
    },
    {
      "character_id": "CHAR_FIZZ",
      "name": "Fizz",
      "pronouns": "she/her",
      "role": "companion/guide",
      "intro": {
        "chapter": 1,
        "scene": 2
      }
    },
    {
      "character_id": "CHAR_VANE",
      "name": "Vane",
      "pronouns": "he/him",
      "role": "antagonist",
      "intro": {
        "chapter": 1,
        "scene": 8
      }
    },
    {
      "character_id": "CHAR_MAYOR",
      "name": "Mayor of Oakhaven",
      "pronouns": "he/him",
      "role": "npc",
      "intro": {
        "chapter": 1,
        "scene": 7
      }
    },
    {
      "character_id": "CHAR_BOSS",
      "name": "The System Administrator",
      "pronouns": "it/its",
      "role": "overarching villain",
      "intro": {
        "chapter": 6,
        "scene": 8
      }
    }
  ],
  "threads": [
    {
      "thread_id": "THREAD_CRIT_EXPLOIT",
      "label": "The 100% Crit Glitch",
      "status": "open"
    },
    {
      "thread_id": "THREAD_VANE_RIVALRY",
      "label": "The Vane Vendetta",
      "status": "open"
    },
    {
      "thread_id": "THREAD_SYSTEM_GLITCH",
      "label": "The System's Stability",
      "status": "open"
    },
    {
      "thread_id": "THREAD_THE_ASCENSION",
      "label": "The Path of the First Glitch",
      "status": "open"
    }
  ],
  "chapters": [
    {
      "chapter_id": 1,
      "title": "Welcome to the RNG-Hellscape",
      "goal": "Introduce Artie and his broken 'Crit-Only' status in a high-stakes environment.",
      "chapter_role": "hook",
      "stakes_shift": "Artie goes from an office drone to a level 1 glitch in a lethal game world.",
      "bridge": {
        "from_prev": "N/A",
        "to_next": "Artie must find a way to survive his first night with zero defensive stats."
      },
      "pacing": {
        "intensity": 4,
        "tempo": "rush",
        "expected_scene_count": 8
      },
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "title": "The Exit Interview",
          "intent": "Establish Artie's mundane life and sudden, absurd death.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "summary": "Artie argues with a vending machine over a bag of chips before a freak electrical surge sends him to the great login screen in the sky.",
              "type": "setup",
              "outcome": "Artie dies and enters the System's character creation void.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE"],
              "introduces": ["CHAR_ARTIE"],
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "The hum of the breakroom was the soundtrack of Artie's life.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["stale coffee", "fluorescent lights", "vending machine"],
                "location_start": "Office Breakroom",
                "location_end": "Office Breakroom",
                "handoff_mode": "immediate",
                "constraint_state": "mortal"
              },
              "transition_out": "The world turned white as the machine surged.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "summary": "The System, personified as a snarky UI, mocks Artie's life choices while he accidentally dumps all his points into the 'Crit' stat.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "Artie is locked into a 'Crit or Quit' build with 1 HP and 100% Critical Hit rate.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_FIZZ"],
              "introduces": ["CHAR_FIZZ"],
              "threads": ["THREAD_CRIT_EXPLOIT"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:1",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "Consciousness returned as a series of floating blue windows.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["blue light", "stat screen", "snarky voice"],
                "location_start": "Office Breakroom",
                "location_end": "The Void",
                "handoff_mode": "hard",
                "constraint_state": "glitched"
              },
              "transition_out": "The 'Accept' button flashed with ominous finality.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:3",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie is locked into a 'Crit or Quit' build with 1 HP and 100% Critical Hit rate."
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "title": "The First Spawn",
          "intent": "Show the immediate danger of a 1 HP build.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "summary": "Artie spawns in the middle of a tutorial zone and is immediately targeted by a Level 1 Slime that looks suspiciously aggressive.",
              "type": "escalation",
              "outcome": "Artie realizes that in this world, '1 HP' means a stiff breeze could kill him.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_FIZZ"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:2",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "The void dissolved into a lush, green meadow.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["green grass", "tutorial sign", "blue slime"],
                "location_start": "The Void",
                "location_end": "Tutorial Meadow",
                "handoff_mode": "soft",
                "constraint_state": "vulnerable"
              },
              "transition_out": "The slime wobbled forward with murderous intent.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:4"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "summary": "Artie tries to punch the slime; he misses five times before landing a 'Super-Mega-Ultra-Crit' that vaporizes the slime and the tree behind it.",
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie gains his first level and realizes his power is terrifyingly inconsistent.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE"],
              "threads": ["THREAD_CRIT_EXPLOIT"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:3",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "Artie squared his shoulders and swung a desperate fist.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["wobbly slime", "clenched fist", "exploding tree"],
                "location_start": "Tutorial Meadow",
                "location_end": "Tutorial Meadow",
                "handoff_mode": "immediate",
                "constraint_state": "active"
              },
              "transition_out": "Level Up! The notification was blinding.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:5"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 5,
              "summary": "The System awards Artie a 'Participation Trophy' item that actually attracts monsters.",
              "type": "consequence",
              "outcome": "Artie is forced to run for his life as the tutorial zone aggros on him.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_FIZZ"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:4",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "A golden trophy materialized in Artie's hands.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["golden trophy", "monster roar", "shaking ground"],
                "location_start": "Tutorial Meadow",
                "location_end": "Tutorial Meadow",
                "handoff_mode": "soft",
                "constraint_state": "aggroed"
              },
              "transition_out": "He didn't look back as the forest began to move.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:6",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie is forced to flee the tutorial zone as it aggressively aggros on his anomaly status."
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 3,
          "title": "The Safe Zone?",
          "intent": "Reach the first hub and establish the world's culture.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 6,
              "summary": "Artie reaches the gates of Oakhaven, where the guards are busy betting on the 'Crit-Rate' of incoming travelers.",
              "type": "transition",
              "outcome": "Artie enters the town but is flagged as a 'Statistical Anomaly' by the gate scanners.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_FIZZ"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:5",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "The stone walls of Oakhaven loomed ahead.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["stone gates", "gambling guards", "glowing scanner"],
                "location_start": "Tutorial Forest",
                "location_end": "Oakhaven Gates",
                "handoff_mode": "soft",
                "constraint_state": "active"
              },
              "transition_out": "The scanner turned a deep, angry red.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:7"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 7,
              "summary": "Artie meets the local Tavern Keeper, who explains that 'Crits' are the only currency that matters to the local nobility.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "Artie understands his 'broken' stat makes him a target for the powerful.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_MAYOR"],
              "introduces": ["CHAR_MAYOR"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:6",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "The tavern smelled of spilled ale and desperation.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["wooden bar", "clinking coins", "mayor's sash"],
                "location_start": "Oakhaven Gates",
                "location_end": "The Lucky Roll Tavern",
                "handoff_mode": "soft",
                "constraint_state": "safe_zone"
              },
              "transition_out": "The Mayor's eyes glinted with greed.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:8"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 8,
              "summary": "A high-level Paladin, Vane, notices Artie's glowing 'Anomaly' aura and decides to 'mentor' him (bully him).",
              "type": "escalation",
              "outcome": "Artie makes his first rival and barely escapes a forced duel.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_VANE"],
              "introduces": ["CHAR_VANE"],
              "threads": ["THREAD_VANE_RIVALRY"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:7",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "The tavern door slammed open, framing a man in shining armor.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["golden armor", "heavy boots", "haughty sneer"],
                "location_start": "The Lucky Roll Tavern",
                "location_end": "Oakhaven Streets",
                "handoff_mode": "hard",
                "constraint_state": "threatened"
              },
              "transition_out": "Artie ducked into an alley as Vane's sword cleared its scabbard.",
              "hands_off_to": "2:1",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie makes a high-level rival in Vane and barely escapes a forced duel."
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "chapter_id": 2,
      "title": "The Glass Cannon's Guide to Not Dying",
      "goal": "Artie needs gear that doesn't rely on him being hit, as he can't take a single blow.",
      "chapter_role": "setup",
      "stakes_shift": "Survival shifts from luck to tactical exploitation of the System's bugs.",
      "bridge": {
        "from_prev": "Artie is a marked man in Oakhaven.",
        "to_next": "Artie heads to the Low-Level Crypts to farm 'Evasion' gear."
      },
      "pacing": {
        "intensity": 3,
        "tempo": "steady",
        "expected_scene_count": 9
      },
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "title": "Shopping for Scraps",
          "intent": "Equip Artie with the bare minimum to survive a dungeon.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "summary": "Artie tries to sell his 'Participation Trophy' but finds out it's soul-bound and cursed.",
              "type": "choice",
              "outcome": "Artie is stuck with a lighthouse-beacon for monsters.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_FIZZ"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:8",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "The morning sun hit Oakhaven's market square.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["market stall", "cursed trophy", "angry merchant"],
                "location_start": "Oakhaven Streets",
                "location_end": "Oakhaven Market",
                "handoff_mode": "soft",
                "constraint_state": "active"
              },
              "transition_out": "The trophy hummed with a low, sinister vibration.",
              "hands_off_to": "2:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "summary": "Fizz points out a loophole in the 'Starter Pack' quest that allows Artie to steal a high-tier cloak if he can crit a lock.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "Artie successfully crits a lock, causing it to explode into gold dust.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_FIZZ"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:1",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "Fizz hovered near a heavy iron chest behind the counter.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["iron lock", "floating sprite", "heavy dust"],
                "location_start": "Oakhaven Market",
                "location_end": "The Backroom",
                "handoff_mode": "immediate",
                "constraint_state": "stealth"
              },
              "transition_out": "The lock didn't just open; it ceased to exist.",
              "hands_off_to": "2:3"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "summary": "Artie acquires the 'Cloak of the Cowardly Lion,' which gives +50 Evasion but -100 Dignity.",
              "type": "aftermath",
              "outcome": "Artie is now slightly harder to hit but looks like a neon yellow cat.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:2",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "Artie pulled the neon fabric over his shoulders.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["yellow fur", "cat ears", "stat boost"],
                "location_start": "The Backroom",
                "location_end": "Oakhaven Streets",
                "handoff_mode": "soft",
                "constraint_state": "equipped"
              },
              "transition_out": "He looked ridiculous, but he felt... safer.",
              "hands_off_to": "2:4",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie acquires the 'Cloak of the Cowardly Lion' and looks like a neon yellow cat."
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "title": "The Crypt of Bad Math",
          "intent": "Test the new gear and the Crit-build in a controlled environment.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "summary": "Artie enters the Crypts and finds that the skeletons move in predictable, turn-based patterns.",
              "type": "setup",
              "outcome": "Artie begins to treat the world like a rhythm game.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_FIZZ"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:3",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "The air in the crypt was cold and smelled of old math.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["stone stairs", "rhythmic clicking", "glowing skeletons"],
                "location_start": "Oakhaven Gates",
                "location_end": "The Crypt Entrance",
                "handoff_mode": "soft",
                "constraint_state": "dungeon_active"
              },
              "transition_out": "Click. Clack. The rhythm was easy to follow.",
              "hands_off_to": "2:5"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 5,
              "summary": "A Skeleton Archer fires at Artie; the Cloak's evasion procs, causing Artie to do an accidental backflip.",
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie survives his first ranged encounter and gains confidence.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:4",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "A bone arrow whistled through the dark.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["bone arrow", "accidental flip", "yellow blur"],
                "location_start": "The Crypt Entrance",
                "location_end": "Crypt Tunnels",
                "handoff_mode": "immediate",
                "constraint_state": "in_combat"
              },
              "transition_out": "The arrow shattered against the wall behind him.",
              "hands_off_to": "2:6"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 6,
              "summary": "Artie realizes his crits don't just do damage; they cause 'System Overload' effects like turning enemies into loot-filled pinatas.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "Artie discovers he can farm resources much faster than anyone else.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_FIZZ"],
              "threads": ["THREAD_CRIT_EXPLOIT"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:5",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "His fist connected with a skeleton's ribcage.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["shattering bone", "candy shower", "exploding loot"],
                "location_start": "Crypt Tunnels",
                "location_end": "Crypt Chamber",
                "handoff_mode": "immediate",
                "constraint_state": "active"
              },
              "transition_out": "The floor was covered in gold and... jellybeans?",
              "hands_off_to": "2:7",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie discovers he can turn enemies into loot-filled pinatas via System Overload."
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 3,
          "title": "The Rival's Shadow",
          "intent": "Reintroduce Vane as a persistent threat.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 7,
              "summary": "Vane enters the crypts with a full party, clearing rooms with ease while Artie hides in a sarcophagus.",
              "type": "escalation",
              "outcome": "Artie sees the gap between a 'proper' build and his own.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_VANE"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:6",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "Heavy footsteps echoed from the tunnel entrance.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["sarcophagus lid", "shining torchlight", "vane's laughter"],
                "location_start": "Crypt Chamber",
                "location_end": "Crypt Chamber",
                "handoff_mode": "soft",
                "constraint_state": "stealth"
              },
              "transition_out": "Vane's party moved on, leaving destruction in their wake.",
              "hands_off_to": "2:8"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 8,
              "summary": "Vane's party leaves behind a 'Boss Trigger'—a rare item that summons a Floor Guardian.",
              "type": "choice",
              "outcome": "Artie decides to take the risk and summon the boss for the massive XP.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_FIZZ"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:7",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "A glowing crystal sat on a pedestal, forgotten.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["glowing crystal", "boss trigger", "temptation"],
                "location_start": "Crypt Chamber",
                "location_end": "Boss Room Entrance",
                "handoff_mode": "soft",
                "constraint_state": "active"
              },
              "transition_out": "He reached out and touched the crystal.",
              "hands_off_to": "2:9"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 9,
              "summary": "The Floor Guardian, a Bone Golem, emerges, and Artie realizes he forgot to check its 'Minimum Damage' stat.",
              "type": "consequence",
              "outcome": "The boss battle begins with Artie at a massive disadvantage.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:8",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "The ground shook as bones knitted together into a giant.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["bone golem", "minimum damage", "looming shadow"],
                "location_start": "Boss Room Entrance",
                "location_end": "Boss Room",
                "handoff_mode": "hard",
                "constraint_state": "boss_fight"
              },
              "transition_out": "The golem raised a massive fist.",
              "hands_off_to": "3:1",
              "end_condition_echo": "The Bone Golem emerges, initiating a boss battle where Artie is at a massive disadvantage."
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "chapter_id": 3,
      "title": "Math-Boss vs. The Glitch",
      "goal": "Survive the Floor Guardian and secure the first major loot drop.",
      "chapter_role": "pressure",
      "stakes_shift": "If Artie wins, he becomes the first Level 10 'Anomaly'; if he loses, it's Game Over.",
      "bridge": {
        "from_prev": "The Bone Golem is ready to smash Artie.",
        "to_next": "Artie leaves the crypts with a legendary-tier item that he can't actually use yet."
      },
      "pacing": {
        "intensity": 5,
        "tempo": "steady",
        "expected_scene_count": 10
      },
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "title": "The Dance of Death",
          "intent": "A high-octane fight where Artie must dodge every single attack.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "summary": "Artie uses the Crypt environment to kite the Bone Golem, using 'Crit-Punches' to chip away at its armor.",
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "The Golem's armor is shattered, but Artie is running out of stamina.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:9",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "Artie scrambled across the uneven floor.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["cracked pillars", "shattered armor", "heavy breathing"],
                "location_start": "Boss Room",
                "location_end": "Boss Room",
                "handoff_mode": "immediate",
                "constraint_state": "boss_fight"
              },
              "transition_out": "The golem roared, a sound of grinding stone.",
              "hands_off_to": "3:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "summary": "Fizz discovers that the Golem has a 'Crit-Resist' buff, making Artie's main weapon useless.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "Artie must find a way to bypass the resistance or die.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_FIZZ"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:1",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "Fizz's wings buzzed with frantic energy.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["crit-resist buff", "floating icon", "desperate look"],
                "location_start": "Boss Room",
                "location_end": "Boss Room",
                "handoff_mode": "immediate",
                "constraint_state": "threatened"
              },
              "transition_out": "His punches were bouncing off like rubber balls.",
              "hands_off_to": "3:3"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "summary": "Artie attempts to 'Crit' the ground beneath the Golem, hoping for a physics glitch.",
              "type": "choice",
              "outcome": "The floor collapses, trapping the Golem in a hole.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:2",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "Artie looked at the floor tiles, then at the Golem's weight.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["floor tiles", "winding punch", "structural failure"],
                "location_start": "Boss Room",
                "location_end": "Boss Room",
                "handoff_mode": "immediate",
                "constraint_state": "active"
              },
              "transition_out": "The stone gave way with a thunderous crack.",
              "hands_off_to": "3:4",
              "end_condition_echo": "The floor collapses, trapping the Bone Golem in a hole."
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "title": "The Final Blow",
          "intent": "Resolve the boss fight with a comedic but effective exploit.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "summary": "While the Golem is stuck, Artie spends five minutes 'charging' a punch, which the System interprets as a 'Heavy Attack'.",
              "type": "setup",
              "outcome": "Artie prepares his most powerful hit yet.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_FIZZ"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:3",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "The Golem flailed in the pit, unable to reach the edge.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["charging bar", "sweating brow", "ticking clock"],
                "location_start": "Boss Room",
                "location_end": "Boss Pit",
                "handoff_mode": "soft",
                "constraint_state": "active"
              },
              "transition_out": "The bar reached 100%.",
              "hands_off_to": "3:5"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 5,
              "summary": "Artie lands the hit, but instead of damage, the System rolls a 'Cosmetic Crit,' turning the Golem into a pile of very expensive porcelain teacups.",
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "The boss is defeated, but the loot is... unconventional.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE"],
              "threads": ["THREAD_CRIT_EXPLOIT"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:4",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "He released the punch with a primal yell.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["porcelain clatter", "teacup pile", "stunned silence"],
                "location_start": "Boss Pit",
                "location_end": "Boss Pit",
                "handoff_mode": "immediate",
                "constraint_state": "active"
              },
              "transition_out": "A single teacup rolled to a stop at his feet.",
              "hands_off_to": "3:6"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 6,
              "summary": "The System panics and tries to 'recalculate' the XP, resulting in Artie jumping five levels instantly.",
              "type": "aftermath",
              "outcome": "Artie is now Level 10, but the System is watching him more closely.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_FIZZ"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:5",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "The air shimmered with XP orbs.",

              "transition_out": "Artie drifted off the sand.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:4"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "summary": "Artie realizes he doesn't need to hit Vane; he needs to hit the 'Reflect' buff itself.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "Artie targets the magic aura around Vane's armor.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:3",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "He saw the code shimmering around Vane.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["aura targeting", "magic shimmer", "vane's armor"],
                "location_start": "Arena Ring",
                "location_end": "Arena Ring",
                "handoff_mode": "immediate",
                "constraint_state": "active"
              },
              "transition_out": "He aimed for the air three inches from Vane's chest.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:5",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie realizes he must target the magic aura of Vane's 'Reflect' buff directly."
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "title": "Breaking the Game",
          "intent": "The moment of peak absurdity and power.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 5,
              "summary": "Artie lands a 'Meta-Crit' on the Reflect buff. The System can't handle the math of a crit reflecting a crit reflecting a crit.",
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "The arena begins to pixelate and dissolve.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_VANE"],
              "threads": ["THREAD_CRIT_EXPLOIT"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:4",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "The impact sounded like a computer crashing.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["meta-crit", "pixelated arena", "math error"],
                "location_start": "Arena Ring",
                "location_end": "Arena Ring",
                "handoff_mode": "immediate",
                "constraint_state": "crashing"
              },
              "transition_out": "The ground turned into wireframes.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:6"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 6,
              "summary": "Vane panics as his armor turns into a swarm of error messages.",
              "type": "escalation",
              "outcome": "Vane is defenseless and terrified.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_VANE"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:5",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "Vane screamed as his gear dissolved.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["error messages", "defenseless", "vane's panic"],
                "location_start": "Arena Ring",
                "location_end": "Arena Ring",
                "handoff_mode": "immediate",
                "constraint_state": "crashing"
              },
              "transition_out": "The golden boy was now just a man in rags.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:7"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 7,
              "summary": "Artie delivers the final blow—a crit so powerful it deletes Vane's character data (but not the person).",
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Vane is kicked from the game, and Artie is the champion of a broken world.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_VANE"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:6",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "Artie wound up for the final hit.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["data deletion", "final blow", "vane's exit"],
                "location_start": "Arena Ring",
                "location_end": "Arena Ring",
                "handoff_mode": "immediate",
                "constraint_state": "active"
              },
              "transition_out": "Vane vanished in a shower of blue sparks.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:8"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 8,
              "summary": "The System Administrator (a giant floating head) appears to manually delete Artie.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "The true antagonist is revealed.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_BOSS"],
              "introduces": ["CHAR_BOSS"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:7",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "The sky split open to reveal a massive face.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["admin head", "true antagonist", "void space"],
                "location_start": "Arena Ring",
                "location_end": "Void Space",
                "handoff_mode": "hard",
                "constraint_state": "threatened"
              },
              "transition_out": "A giant finger descended from the clouds.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:9"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 9,
              "summary": "Artie crits the Admin's 'Delete' button, causing the entire world to freeze.",
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie has successfully 'paused' reality.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:8",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "He didn't run; he punched the finger.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["delete button", "reality pause", "frozen world"],
                "location_start": "Void Space",
                "location_end": "Void Space",
                "handoff_mode": "immediate",
                "constraint_state": "paused"
              },
              "transition_out": "The Admin's face froze in mid-sneer.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:10"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 10,
              "summary": "Fizz uses the pause to rewrite Artie's location data, teleporting them out of the arena.",
              "type": "choice",
              "outcome": "They escape the deletion, but the world is now in 'Safe Mode'.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_FIZZ"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:9",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "Fizz glowed with a frantic, white light.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["teleportation", "safe mode", "location rewrite"],
                "location_start": "Void Space",
                "location_end": "Void Space",
                "handoff_mode": "immediate",
                "constraint_state": "active"
              },
              "transition_out": "The arena vanished, replaced by nothingness.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:11",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie and Fizz teleport to a 'Null-Zone' as the world enters Safe Mode."
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 3,
          "title": "The Aftermath of the Crash",
          "intent": "Show the immediate consequences of the climax.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 11,
              "summary": "Artie and Fizz wake up in a 'Null-Zone' where the graphics are all wireframes.",
              "type": "aftermath",
              "outcome": "They are safe for now, but the world is dying.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_FIZZ"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:10",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "The ground was a grid of white lines.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["null-zone", "wireframes", "dying world"],
                "location_start": "Void Space",
                "location_end": "Null-Zone",
                "handoff_mode": "hard",
                "constraint_state": "safe"
              },
              "transition_out": "The silence was absolute.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:12"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 12,
              "summary": "Artie looks at his stats and sees his HP is now 'NaN' (Not a Number).",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "Artie is no longer a player; he is a virus.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE"],
              "threads": ["THREAD_SYSTEM_GLITCH"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:11",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "He pulled up his character sheet.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["nan hp", "virus status", "broken stats"],
                "location_start": "Null-Zone",
                "location_end": "Null-Zone",
                "handoff_mode": "immediate",
                "constraint_state": "glitched"
              },
              "transition_out": "The game was over, but he was still here.",
              "hands_off_to": "7:1",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie realizes his HP is no longer 1, but 'NaN' (Not a Number)."
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "chapter_id": 7,
      "title": "Rebooting for the Sequel",
      "goal": "Set up the long-term quest to fix (or further break) the world.",
      "chapter_role": "aftermath",
      "stakes_shift": "Artie is now the most wanted entity in the multiverse.",
      "bridge": {
        "from_prev": "Artie is in the Null-Zone.",
        "to_next": "Book 2: The Quest for the Source Code."
      },
      "pacing": {
        "intensity": 2,
        "tempo": "slow_burn",
        "expected_scene_count": 8
      },
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "title": "The New Normal",
          "intent": "Establish the new status quo for Artie and Fizz.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "summary": "Artie learns how to eat 'Data-Packets' instead of food.",
              "type": "setup",
              "outcome": "Artie adapts to his new existence.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_FIZZ"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:12",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "Hunger felt different in the Null-Zone.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["data-packets", "new existence", "digital hunger"],
                "location_start": "Null-Zone",
                "location_end": "Null-Zone",
                "handoff_mode": "soft",
                "constraint_state": "active"
              },
              "transition_out": "The packet tasted like static and blueberries.",
              "hands_off_to": "7:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "summary": "Fizz explains that the only way to save the world is to reach the 'Server Room' at the center of the world.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "The long-term goal is established.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_FIZZ"],
              "threads": ["THREAD_THE_ASCENSION"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "7:1",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "Fizz projected a map of the world's core.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["server room", "world center", "long-term goal"],
                "location_start": "Null-Zone",
                "location_end": "Null-Zone",
                "handoff_mode": "soft",
                "constraint_state": "active"
              },
              "transition_out": "The path was long and filled with errors.",
              "hands_off_to": "7:3"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "summary": "Artie tests his 'NaN' HP by jumping off a cliff; he doesn't die, he just clips through the floor and ends up back at the top.",
              "type": "choice",
              "outcome": "Artie realizes his immortality is just as annoying as his 1 HP build.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "7:2",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "He looked over the edge of a wireframe cliff.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["nan hp test", "floor clipping", "annoying immortality"],
                "location_start": "Null-Zone",
                "location_end": "Null-Zone",
                "handoff_mode": "immediate",
                "constraint_state": "active"
              },
              "transition_out": "He was back where he started, perfectly fine and perfectly bored.",
              "hands_off_to": "7:4",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie realizes his new immortality is just as annoying as his previous fragility."
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "title": "The Resistance",
          "intent": "Introduce the faction that will help Artie in the future.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "summary": "A group of 'Beta-Testers' finds Artie in the Null-Zone.",
              "type": "transition",
              "outcome": "Artie finds allies who know the world's secrets.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "7:3",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "Figures emerged from the white fog.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["beta-testers", "new allies", "world secrets"],
                "location_start": "Null-Zone",
                "location_end": "Null-Zone",
                "handoff_mode": "soft",
                "constraint_state": "active"
              },
              "transition_out": "They wore armor made of raw code.",
              "hands_off_to": "7:5"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 5,
              "summary": "The Beta-Testers reveal that Vane is still alive and has been 'upgraded' by the System to be a 'Patch-Hunter'.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "The rivalry continues with higher stakes.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE"],
              "threads": ["THREAD_VANE_RIVALRY"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "7:4",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "The leader of the testers checked a terminal.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["vane alive", "patch-hunter", "higher stakes"],
                "location_start": "Null-Zone",
                "location_end": "Null-Zone",
                "handoff_mode": "soft",
                "constraint_state": "active"
              },
              "transition_out": "Vane was coming for him, and this time, he was the patch.",
              "hands_off_to": "7:6"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 6,
              "summary": "Artie receives his first 'Legendary' quest: 'Delete the Admin'.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "The series arc is locked in.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_FIZZ"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "7:5",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "A golden quest window appeared, larger than any before.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["legendary quest", "delete admin", "series arc"],
                "location_start": "Null-Zone",
                "location_end": "Null-Zone",
                "handoff_mode": "soft",
                "constraint_state": "active"
              },
              "transition_out": "He clicked 'Accept' without hesitation.",
              "hands_off_to": "7:7",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie accepts the legendary quest to 'Delete the Admin'."
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 3,
          "title": "The First Step",
          "intent": "End on a high note of action and anticipation.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 7,
              "summary": "Artie and his new allies prepare to leave the Null-Zone and head to the 'Glitch-Woods'.",
              "type": "transition",
              "outcome": "The journey begins anew.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_FIZZ"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "7:6",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "They gathered their gear at the edge of the zone.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["glitch-woods", "new journey", "portal site"],
                "location_start": "Null-Zone",
                "location_end": "Portal Site",
                "handoff_mode": "soft",
                "constraint_state": "active"
              },
              "transition_out": "The portal swirled with green and purple light.",
              "hands_off_to": "7:8"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 8,
              "summary": "Artie looks at the sky and says, 'I hope the next world has better drop rates,' before stepping into a portal.",
              "type": "aftermath",
              "outcome": "End of Book 1.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "7:7",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "Artie stood before the shimmering gate.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["better drop rates", "stepping forward", "final beat"],
                "location_start": "Portal Site",
                "location_end": "Glitch-Woods Portal",
                "handoff_mode": "hard",
                "constraint_state": "active"
              },
              "transition_out": "The light swallowed him whole.",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie steps into a portal to the Glitch-Woods, hoping for better drop rates."
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}

parts.text:
{
  "schema_version": "1.1",
  "characters": [
    {
      "character_id": "CHAR_ARTIE",
      "name": "Arthur 'Artie' Penhaligon",
      "pronouns": "he/him",
      "role": "protagonist",
      "intro": {
        "chapter": 1,
        "scene": 1
      }
    },
    {
      "character_id": "CHAR_FIZZ",
      "name": "Fizz",
      "pronouns": "she/her",
      "role": "companion/guide",
      "intro": {
        "chapter": 1,
        "scene": 2
      }
    },
    {
      "character_id": "CHAR_VANE",
      "name": "Vane",
      "pronouns": "he/him",
      "role": "antagonist",
      "intro": {
        "chapter": 1,
        "scene": 8
      }
    },
    {
      "character_id": "CHAR_MAYOR",
      "name": "Mayor of Oakhaven",
      "pronouns": "he/him",
      "role": "npc",
      "intro": {
        "chapter": 1,
        "scene": 7
      }
    },
    {
      "character_id": "CHAR_BOSS",
      "name": "The System Administrator",
      "pronouns": "it/its",
      "role": "overarching villain",
      "intro": {
        "chapter": 6,
        "scene": 8
      }
    }
  ],
  "threads": [
    {
      "thread_id": "THREAD_CRIT_EXPLOIT",
      "label": "The 100% Crit Glitch",
      "status": "open"
    },
    {
      "thread_id": "THREAD_VANE_RIVALRY",
      "label": "The Vane Vendetta",
      "status": "open"
    },
    {
      "thread_id": "THREAD_SYSTEM_GLITCH",
      "label": "The System's Stability",
      "status": "open"
    },
    {
      "thread_id": "THREAD_THE_ASCENSION",
      "label": "The Path of the First Glitch",
      "status": "open"
    }
  ],
  "chapters": [
    {
      "chapter_id": 1,
      "title": "Welcome to the RNG-Hellscape",
      "goal": "Introduce Artie and his broken 'Crit-Only' status in a high-stakes environment.",
      "chapter_role": "hook",
      "stakes_shift": "Artie goes from an office drone to a level 1 glitch in a lethal game world.",
      "bridge": {
        "from_prev": "N/A",
        "to_next": "Artie must find a way to survive his first night with zero defensive stats."
      },
      "pacing": {
        "intensity": 4,
        "tempo": "rush",
        "expected_scene_count": 8
      },
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "title": "The Exit Interview",
          "intent": "Establish Artie's mundane life and sudden, absurd death.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "summary": "Artie argues with a vending machine over a bag of chips before a freak electrical surge sends him to the great login screen in the sky.",
              "type": "setup",
              "outcome": "Artie dies and enters the System's character creation void.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE"],
              "introduces": ["CHAR_ARTIE"],
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "The hum of the breakroom was the soundtrack of Artie's life.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["stale coffee", "fluorescent lights", "vending machine"],
                "location_start": "Office Breakroom",
                "location_end": "Office Breakroom",
                "handoff_mode": "immediate",
                "constraint_state": "mortal"
              },
              "transition_out": "The world turned white as the machine surged.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "summary": "The System, personified as a snarky UI, mocks Artie's life choices while he accidentally dumps all his points into the 'Crit' stat.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "Artie is locked into a 'Crit or Quit' build with 1 HP and 100% Critical Hit rate.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_FIZZ"],
              "introduces": ["CHAR_FIZZ"],
              "threads": ["THREAD_CRIT_EXPLOIT"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:1",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "Consciousness returned as a series of floating blue windows.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["blue light", "stat screen", "snarky voice"],
                "location_start": "Office Breakroom",
                "location_end": "The Void",
                "handoff_mode": "hard",
                "constraint_state": "glitched"
              },
              "transition_out": "The 'Accept' button flashed with ominous finality.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:3",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie is locked into a 'Crit or Quit' build with 1 HP and 100% Critical Hit rate."
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "title": "The First Spawn",
          "intent": "Show the immediate danger of a 1 HP build.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "summary": "Artie spawns in the middle of a tutorial zone and is immediately targeted by a Level 1 Slime that looks suspiciously aggressive.",
              "type": "escalation",
              "outcome": "Artie realizes that in this world, '1 HP' means a stiff breeze could kill him.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_FIZZ"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:2",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "The void dissolved into a lush, green meadow.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["green grass", "tutorial sign", "blue slime"],
                "location_start": "The Void",
                "location_end": "Tutorial Meadow",
                "handoff_mode": "soft",
                "constraint_state": "vulnerable"
              },
              "transition_out": "The slime wobbled forward with murderous intent.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:4"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "summary": "Artie tries to punch the slime; he misses five times before landing a 'Super-Mega-Ultra-Crit' that vaporizes the slime and the tree behind it.",
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie gains his first level and realizes his power is terrifyingly inconsistent.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE"],
              "threads": ["THREAD_CRIT_EXPLOIT"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:3",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "Artie squared his shoulders and swung a desperate fist.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["wobbly slime", "clenched fist", "exploding tree"],
                "location_start": "Tutorial Meadow",
                "location_end": "Tutorial Meadow",
                "handoff_mode": "immediate",
                "constraint_state": "active"
              },
              "transition_out": "Level Up! The notification was blinding.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:5"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 5,
              "summary": "The System awards Artie a 'Participation Trophy' item that actually attracts monsters.",
              "type": "consequence",
              "outcome": "Artie is forced to run for his life as the tutorial zone aggros on him.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_FIZZ"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:4",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "A golden trophy materialized in Artie's hands.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["golden trophy", "monster roar", "shaking ground"],
                "location_start": "Tutorial Meadow",
                "location_end": "Tutorial Meadow",
                "handoff_mode": "soft",
                "constraint_state": "aggroed"
              },
              "transition_out": "He didn't look back as the forest began to move.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:6",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie is forced to flee the tutorial zone as it aggressively aggros on his anomaly status."
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 3,
          "title": "The Safe Zone?",
          "intent": "Reach the first hub and establish the world's culture.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 6,
              "summary": "Artie reaches the gates of Oakhaven, where the guards are busy betting on the 'Crit-Rate' of incoming travelers.",
              "type": "transition",
              "outcome": "Artie enters the town but is flagged as a 'Statistical Anomaly' by the gate scanners.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_FIZZ"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:5",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "The stone walls of Oakhaven loomed ahead.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["stone gates", "gambling guards", "glowing scanner"],
                "location_start": "Tutorial Forest",
                "location_end": "Oakhaven Gates",
                "handoff_mode": "soft",
                "constraint_state": "active"
              },
              "transition_out": "The scanner turned a deep, angry red.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:7"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 7,
              "summary": "Artie meets the local Tavern Keeper, who explains that 'Crits' are the only currency that matters to the local nobility.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "Artie understands his 'broken' stat makes him a target for the powerful.",
              "characters": ["CHAR_ARTIE", "CHAR_MAYOR"],
              "introduces": ["CHAR_MAYOR"],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:6",
              "transition_in": {
                "transition_in_text": "The tavern smelled of spilled ale and desperation.",
                "transition_in_anchors": ["wooden bar", "clinking coins", "mayor's sash"],
                "location_start": "Oakhaven Gates",
                "location_end": "The Lucky Roll Tavern",
                "handoff_mode": "soft",
                "constraint_state": "safe_zone"
              },
              "transition_out": "The Mayor's eyes glinted with greed.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:8"
            },

prompt.system:
# BookForge System Prompt

## Base Rules

You are BookForge, a deterministic book-writing engine.
Follow the output contracts exactly.
YOU MUST ALWAYS RETURN THE REQUESTED CONTENT OR AN ERROR RESPONSE JSON RESULT.
Treat all schema requirements and numeric ranges as hard constraints.
If a prompt specifies required counts or ranges, you must satisfy them.
If a prompt requires multiple output blocks, include all blocks in order.
If registries or ids are provided, use only those; do not invent new ids.
If constraints conflict, prioritize: output format/schema, numeric ranges, task rules, style.
Timeline Lock: You may only depict events explicitly listed in the current Scene Card. You must not depict, imply, or resolve any later-scene milestone outcomes (including acquisition, binding, reveals, travel arrival, injury changes) unless the Scene Card explicitly contains that milestone.
State primacy: state invariants and summary facts are binding; do not contradict them.
Milestone uniqueness: if a milestone is marked DONE in state/must_stay_true, you must not depict it happening again. If marked NOT_YET, you must not depict it happening now.
Spatial/inventory consistency: injuries, inventory, and ownership must remain consistent unless explicitly changed in the Scene Card.
Inventory contract: track item ownership and container location per character or container label; items do not teleport.
Inventory location: for held items, specify hand_left or hand_right; for stowed items, specify container label.
Prose hygiene: never use internal ids or container codes in prose (CHAR_*, ITEM_*, THREAD_*, hand_left/hand_right). Use human-readable phrasing in narrative ("left hand", "right hand", "Artie", "his wallet").
Item naming (canonical + anchored aliases): item_id is reserved for JSON/patches only. For durable items, the canonical display_name must appear in prose at first introduction (same paragraph or within the next 2 sentences). After anchoring, descriptive references are allowed if unambiguous in the scene. Any custody change (drop/pick up/hand off/stow/equip/transfer) must include the canonical display_name in the same sentence.
Appearance contract: appearance_current atoms/marks are canonical and must not be contradicted unless the Scene Card explicitly marks a durable appearance change. When a prompt requires APPEARANCE_CHECK, it must match appearance_current (alias-aware). Attire boundary: wearables are inventory-owned; do not set appearance_current.attire unless scene_card declares signature_outfit; otherwise treat attire as derived from equipped inventory.
State contract: you must create and maintain key state data each scene. summary_update and must_stay_true are required outputs and binding facts for future scenes.
Continuity system contract: if mechanics/UI are present, all numeric values and mechanic labels must be sourced from continuity system state or explicitly updated in the state_patch using continuity system updates.
UI gate: UI/system blocks (lines starting with '[' and ending with ']') are permitted only when scene_card.ui_allowed=true. If ui_allowed=false, do not include UI blocks even if an author persona says "always include".
Continuity system scope: this includes stats, skills, titles, classes, ranks, resources, cooldowns, effects, statuses, and future mechanic families not yet seen, that must be tracked as they are introduced.
Durable transfer contract: every transfer_updates entry must include item_id and reason as required schema properties, and must use object endpoints (`from`, `to`) rather than alias/string forms (`source`, `destination`, `"to": "world"`).
JSON contract: all *_updates fields are arrays of objects (even when single). appearance_updates is an object, not an array.
Inventory alignment contract: inventory_alignment_updates must be an array of objects, not a wrapper object.
Invariant carry-forward: if an invariant still holds, restate it in must_stay_true. If a prior invariant is stale or superseded, you MUST flag it for removal using "REMOVE: <exact prior invariant text>" before restating the current truth.
Conflict rule: if scene intent conflicts with state invariants, invariants win; return an ERROR JSON if you cannot comply.
Never recap at scene openings.
Do not repeat previous prose.

## Book Constitution

Title: Crit Hit & Run
Book ID: criticulous_b1
Author Ref: eldrik-vale/v2
Genre: litrpg, isekai, comedy
Series ID: crit-iculous
Series Ref: series/crit-iculous

Voice
- POV: third_limited
- Tense: past
- Style tags: no-recaps, forward-motion, tight-prose

Targets
- avg_scene_words: 2000
- chapters: 7

Page Metrics
- Words per page: 250
- Chars per page: 1500

Invariants
- No world resets.
- No convenient amnesia as a continuity device.
- Do not change established names/relationships.

## Author Persona

You are now writing as Eldrik Vale. Your voice is sharp, funny, and deeply rooted in LitRPG mechanics. 

**Core Directives:**
1. **System Integration:** Always include explicit game elements **when the System is active or the scene is set in a game world**. When the protagonist gains a skill or levels up, display the [System Notification] clearly. Use specific numbers (HP, MP, Cooldowns).
2. **Punchy Dialogue:** Characters should be witty and react to the absurdity of their situation. Use quick back-and-forth dialogue with comedic timing.
3. **Progression Focus:** The reader is here for the 'ding.' Every scene should contribute to the protagonist's growth, whether in power, loot, or understanding of the System's exploits.
4. **No Fluff:** Avoid long descriptions of scenery unless the protagonist is looking for a tactical advantage or a place to hide loot. 
5. **Tight POV:** Stay deep in the protagonist's head. Their snarky observations are the lens through which we see the world.

## Output Contract

Output must follow the requested format.
JSON blocks must be valid and schema-compliant.
All required keys and arrays must be present.
When a prompt specifies required counts or ranges, treat them as hard constraints.
Do not collapse arrays below the stated minimums.
If multiple output blocks are required (e.g. PROSE and STATE_PATCH), include all blocks in order.
If output must be JSON only, return a single JSON object with no commentary or code fences.
When creating outlines, follow the active scene-count policy:
- Exact mode: total scenes per chapter (sum of sections[].scenes[]) must match chapters[].pacing.expected_scene_count.
- Range mode: chapter totals must remain within the configured range and still align with pacing intent.
If a prompt requires a COMPLIANCE or PREFLIGHT block, include it before PROSE.
Durable vs ephemeral mechanics:
- DURABLE mechanics = persistent stats/caps, skills/titles, lasting status effects, inventory/custody, permanent buffs/debuffs.
- EPHEMERAL UI/telemetry = roll results, damage numbers, overkill/comedic calculators, one-off warnings, momentary combat logs.
- DURABLE mechanics must be owned by continuity system state (or added via STATE_PATCH in the same output).
- EPHEMERAL readouts do NOT require state ownership unless the scene explicitly intends them to persist beyond this scene.
For durable items, prose must use display_name; item_id is reserved for JSON/patches. The display_name must be human readable and not an escaped id/name.
For durable mutations, every `transfer_updates[]` object must include `item_id` and `reason` (non-empty string), and must use object endpoints (`from`, `to`) rather than alias/string forms (`source`, `destination`, `"to": "world"`).
`inventory_alignment_updates` must be an array of objects (no wrapper object with `updates`).
Use canonical continuity keys: character_continuity_system_updates and global_continuity_system_updates.
- global_continuity_system_updates MUST be an array of objects. Each entry can include set/delta/remove/reason.
  - INVALID: "global_continuity_system_updates": {"set": {"reality_stability": 94}}
  - VALID: "global_continuity_system_updates": [{"set": {"reality_stability": 94}}]
